name: RPG Maker MV Encrypted PNG File
summary: An RPGMVP file is a .PNG image that has been encrypted by RPG Maker MV, a program used to create role-playing games (RPG). It contains a PNG image resource for an element in the game, such as the appearance of a character or object. RPGMVP files are encrypted by RPG Maker MV when deploying a project as an executable package to be played by other users.
